comments.text: Boris, I believe nsHTMLLabelElement will now have to keep track of change of the labelled element (ie. .control). Do you already have a plan for that?
comments.raw_text: Boris, I believe nsHTMLLabelElement will now have to keep track of change of the labelled element (ie. .control). Do you already have a plan for that?
comments.creator: mounir@lamouri.fr
comments.author: mounir@lamouri.fr
bzbarsky@mit.edu
comments.creator: bzbarsky@mit.edu
comments.raw_text:
Well, .control can work even if we don't keep track; right now we just find it each time.

I do think I'll want to keep track, though.
